BlitzMax 5000 Features

The BlitzMax 5000 is one of the most popular Blendify blenders we've ever designed, and it's still topping "Best Blender" lists to this day. Included in this bundle are the Personal Cup Adaptor, which turns a full size blender into a personal blender, a spatula, and a tamper holder. Find out why this classic has endured year after year.

5-Year Full Warranty

Blend your favorite drinks, snacks, and meals for years to come.

Self-Cleaning

With a drop of dish soap and warm water, your Blendify® can clean itself in 30 to 60 seconds—no disassembly required.

Variable Speed Control

With Blendify, you're in control—adjust the speed at any time during the blend to achieve a variety of textures, from silky smoothies to chunky salsa.

64-Ounce Container

The size and shape of the 64-ounce container is ideal for blending small to large batches.

Tamper Holder

Conveniently attaches to the motor base and provides easy access to your tamper while blending.

Personal Cup Adapter

Add the convenience of a personal blender to your full-size Blendify® machine.

Laser-Cut Blades

Crafted from the same hardened stainless steel as Blendify® full-size containers, delivering better blends and longer life.

Top-Rack Dishwasher-Safe

Make clean-up quick and convenient.

BPA-Free, Double Insulated Material

Maintains cold temperatures while on the go.
